extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite     Level 3 and (MATH120 or MATH121 or MATH122 or MATH124 or MATH126).

basic.description: Interest accumulation factors, annuities, amortization, sinking funds, bonds, yield rates, capital budgeting, contingent payments. Students will work mostly on their own; there will be a total of six survey lectures and six tests throughout the term, plus opportunity for individual help.
basic.subject: MATH
basic.title: Mathematical Theory of Interest
